text: Soni (kumbuchilani) katema kajwawendele Musa wandu wakwe mesi, nitwantesile kuti: “Putasyani simbo jenujo peganga.” Basi nisyaumile mwalakwemo sulo likumi kwisa siwili, mwanti lukosyo lulilose lwamanyilile pakumwela pakwe. (Twasalile kuti): “Lyagani soni mwagani mu lisiki lyampele Allah, nambo nkalapwaga pa chilambo pakuwatanganya
